tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_preferences (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  bike_sharing_preference BOOLEAN,
  carpooling_preference BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE bike_sharing (
  bike_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  bike_location VARCHAR(255),
  availability BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE carpooling (
  carpool_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  carpool_route VARCHAR(255),
  capacity INT
)

CREATE TABLE user_profiles (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR,
    email VARCHAR,
    age INT,
    address VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE bike_sharing_programs (
    program_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    program_name VARCHAR,
    location VARCHAR,
    bikes_available INT,
    is_active BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE carpooling_services (
    service_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    service_name VARCHAR,
    location VARCHAR,
    capacity INT,
    available_seats INT
)

CREATE TABLE user_preferences (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    preference_type VARCHAR,
    preference_value TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE usage_logs (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    action_taken VARCHAR,
    details TEXT
)
